description: Amazon Cognito is a developer-centric and cost-effective customer identity and access management (CIAM) service.
WSO2 Identity Server is a powerful, modern identity and access management solution for your on-premises or cloud environment.

WSO2 Asgardeo is a cloud-native, comprehensive IDaaS and CIAM solution that simplifies identity management, offers seamless single sign-on, and ensures secure access for applications with a focus on enhancing user experience and privacy.
The Soffid Console is the primary module of Soffid 3, serving as the main coordinator for all Soffid Identity Governance logics, installed and accessed via a web portal
